name: Trello - Minimal Dark
description:
A minimal dark theme for trello.com

As trello looks a bit outdated for the year 2016, I decided to create this modern style with a dark accent color, increased margins and a better legibility. This theme is still work in progress.

Colors courtesy of https://invisionapp.com
Go check out their awesome prototyping tool!

Check out my other custom styles on Github: https://github.com/schmuto/custom-styles
